AccountId.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the data.

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

AdGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the ad group.

TimePeriod.description: The time period for the report data.

AccountNumber.description: The number of the account associated with the data.

Country.description: The country where the ad was shown.

State.description: The state where the ad was shown.

MetroArea.description: The metro area where the ad was shown.

City.description: The city where the ad was shown.

ProximityTargetLocation.description: The target location for proximity targeting.

Radius.description: The radius used for proximity targeting.

LocationType.description: The type of location where the ad was shown.

MostSpecificLocation.description: The most specific location where the ad was shown.

AdGroupStatus.description: The status of the ad group.

County.description: The county where the ad was shown.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the location where the ad was shown.

LocationId.description: The unique identifier of the location where the ad was shown.

Goal.description: The goal set for the campaign.

GoalType.description: The type of goal set for the campaign.

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions divided by the total number of impressions.

TopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of top impressions divided by the total number of impressions.

AllConversionsQualified.description: The number of all conversions that are qualified.

Neighborhood.description: The neighborhood where the ad was shown.

AssetGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the asset group.

AssetGroupName.description: The name of the asset group.

AssetGroupStatus.description: The status of the asset group.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for financial data.

DeliveredMatchType.description: The type of matching used for the delivered ad.

AdDistribution.description: The distribution network where the ad was shown.

DeviceType.description: The type of device used to view the ad.

Language.description: The language targeted by the ad.

Network.description: The network where the ad was shown.

DeviceOS.description: The operating system of the device.

TopVsOther.description: The performance comparison of the top positions vs. other positions.

BidMatchType.description: The type of matching used for the bid.

AccountName.description: The name of the account associated with the data.

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group.

Assists.description: The number of assists for conversions.

CostPerAssist.description: The cost per assist for conversions.

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The number of view-through conversions that are qualified.

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for all conversions.

ConversionRate.description: The rate at which conversions occur.

ConversionsQualified.description: The number of conversions that are qualified.

AveragePosition.description: The average position of the ad.

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions.

AllConversions.description: The total number of all conversions.

AllConversionRate.description: The rate at which all conversions occur.

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue from all conversions.

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The revenue per conversion for all conversions.

RevenuePerAssist.description: The revenue per assist for conversions.
